languages.text: "У меня есть филактерия с кровью госпожи. Необходимо отнести ее в лабораторию, что находится за одной из дверей реликвария. Древнейший из священных механизмов поможет воссоздать жезл — {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецы{/g} денно и нощно проводили обряды ублажения машинного духа, дабы он послужил на благо дома в самый отчаянный час. И вот он пробил".

traits.locale_text: "У меня есть филактерия с кровью госпожи. Необходимо отнести ее в лабораторию, что находится за одной из дверей реликвария. Древнейший из священных механизмов поможет воссоздать жезл — {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецы{/g} денно и нощно проводили обряды ублажения машинного духа, дабы он послужил на благо дома в самый отчаянный час. И вот он пробил".

languages.text: "I have a phylactery containing the mistress's blood. It needs to be taken to the laboratory, which is located behind one of the reliquary doors. The most ancient of sacred mechanisms will help to rebuild the rod — the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} ceaselessly performed the rites of appeasement so that the machine spirit would serve the House in its time of need. The fateful hour is now upon us."
languages.original_text: "У меня есть филактерия с кровью госпожи. Необходимо отнести ее в лабораторию, что находится за одной из дверей реликвария. И вот он пробил".

"I have a phylactery containing the mistress's blood. It needs to be taken to the laboratory, which is located behind one of the reliquary doors. The most ancient of sacred mechanisms will help to rebuild the rod — the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} ceaselessly performed the rites of appeasement so that the machine spirit would serve the House in its time of need. The fateful hour is now upon us."

languages.text: «Tengo una filacteria que contiene la sangre de la señora. Debe llevarse al laboratorio; lo encontrará tras una de las puertas del relicario. Podrá reconstruir la vara con los antiquísimos mecanismos sagrados. Los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} realizaron incontables ritos de aplacamiento para que el espíritu máquina sirviera a la casa en tiempos de necesidad. El momento crítico ha llegado».
languages.original_text: "I have a phylactery containing the mistress's blood. It needs to be taken to the laboratory, which is located behind one of the reliquary doors. The most ancient of sacred mechanisms will help to rebuild the rod — the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} ceaselessly performed the rites of appeasement so that the machine spirit would serve the House in its time of need. The fateful hour is now upon us."

traits.locale_text: «Tengo una filacteria que contiene la sangre de la señora. Debe llevarse al laboratorio; lo encontrará tras una de las puertas del relicario. Podrá reconstruir la vara con los antiquísimos mecanismos sagrados. Los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} realizaron incontables ritos de aplacamiento para que el espíritu máquina sirviera a la casa en tiempos de necesidad. El momento crítico ha llegado».

languages.text: "Ich habe ein Phylakterion, in dem sich das Blut der Herrin befindet. Es muss ins Laboratorium gebracht werden, das sich hinter einer der Türen des Reliquiars befindet. Die ältesten der heiligen Mechanismen werden helfen, den Stab wiederherzustellen — die {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} haben unaufhörlich die Riten der Besänftigung ausgeführt, damit der Maschinengeist dem Haus in dessen Zeit der Not dienen kann. Nun ist die Schicksalsstunde gekommen."
languages.original_text: "I have a phylactery containing the mistress's blood. It needs to be taken to the laboratory, which is located behind one of the reliquary doors. The most ancient of sacred mechanisms will help to rebuild the rod — the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} ceaselessly performed the rites of appeasement so that the machine spirit would serve the House in its time of need. The fateful hour is now upon us."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe ein Phylakterion, in dem sich das Blut der Herrin befindet. Es muss ins Laboratorium gebracht werden, das sich hinter einer der Türen des Reliquiars befindet. Die ältesten der heiligen Mechanismen werden helfen, den Stab wiederherzustellen — die {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} haben unaufhörlich die Riten der Besänftigung ausgeführt, damit der Maschinengeist dem Haus in dessen Zeit der Not dienen kann. Nun ist die Schicksalsstunde gekommen."

languages.text: « Je possède un phylactère contenant un peu de sang de ma maîtresse. Il faut l'apporter au laboratoire, qui se trouve derrière l'une des portes du reliquaire. Le plus ancien des mécanismes sacrés vous permettra de recréer la tige ; les {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} ont enchaîné les rites d'apaisement pour que l'esprit de la machine serve la maison au moment fatidique. Et ce moment est tout proche. »
languages.original_text: "I have a phylactery containing the mistress's blood. It needs to be taken to the laboratory, which is located behind one of the reliquary doors. The most ancient of sacred mechanisms will help to rebuild the rod — the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} ceaselessly performed the rites of appeasement so that the machine spirit would serve the House in its time of need. The fateful hour is now upon us."

traits.locale_text: « Je possède un phylactère contenant un peu de sang de ma maîtresse. Il faut l'apporter au laboratoire, qui se trouve derrière l'une des portes du reliquaire. Le plus ancien des mécanismes sacrés vous permettra de recréer la tige ; les {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} ont enchaîné les rites d'apaisement pour que l'esprit de la machine serve la maison au moment fatidique. Et ce moment est tout proche. »

languages.text: “我这里有一件盛着女主人鲜血的圣匣，您需要将它带到实验室里，实验室就在圣物库的某扇门后面。在那里，最古老的神圣机械会帮助我们修好这根控制手杖。那些{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}一刻不停地举行安抚仪式，以便让那些机魂在危急时刻为我们的家族服务。如今，这命运的时刻已然到来。”
languages.original_text: "I have a phylactery containing the mistress's blood. It needs to be taken to the laboratory, which is located behind one of the reliquary doors. The most ancient of sacred mechanisms will help to rebuild the rod — the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} ceaselessly performed the rites of appeasement so that the machine spirit would serve the House in its time of need. The fateful hour is now upon us."

traits.locale_text: “我这里有一件盛着女主人鲜血的圣匣，您需要将它带到实验室里，实验室就在圣物库的某扇门后面。在那里，最古老的神圣机械会帮助我们修好这根控制手杖。那些{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}一刻不停地举行安抚仪式，以便让那些机魂在危急时刻为我们的家族服务。如今，这命运的时刻已然到来。”

languages.text: 「主の血が入った聖句箱がある。それを聖骨室のいずれかの扉の向こうにある研究室に持っていかなければならない。最も古い神聖な機構がロッドを作り直す際に役立つだろう…必要な時に機械精霊が一族に力を貸してくれるようにと{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}達がそれらを鎮める儀式をずっと行っていたからな。運命の時が今、近づいている」
languages.original_text: "I have a phylactery containing the mistress's blood. It needs to be taken to the laboratory, which is located behind one of the reliquary doors. The most ancient of sacred mechanisms will help to rebuild the rod — the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} ceaselessly performed the rites of appeasement so that the machine spirit would serve the House in its time of need. The fateful hour is now upon us."

traits.locale_text: 「私は主の血が入った聖句箱を持っている。それをある聖骨箱の扉の後ろにある研究室に持っていかなければならない。最も古い神聖な機構がロッドを作り直す際に役立つだろう…{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}達が戦闘回避の儀式をずっと行っていたから、必要な時に機械精霊が一族に力を貸してくれるはずだ。運命の時が今、我々に近づいて来ている」
「主の血が入った聖句箱がある。それを聖骨室のいずれかの扉の向こうにある研究室に持っていかなければならない。最も古い神聖な機構がロッドを作り直す際に役立つだろう…必要な時に機械精霊が一族に力を貸してくれるようにと{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}達がそれらを鎮める儀式をずっと行っていたからな。運命の時が今、近づいている」

languages.text: "Hanımın kanını ihtiva eden filakteri bende. Bende ama laboratuvara götürülmesi gerek. Orası da kutsal emanet odalarından birinin kapısının ardında. Kutlu mekanizmaların en kadimiyle inşa edeceğiz bu çubuğu. Makine ruhu, Hanemize dar zamanımızda el versin diye {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahipler{/g} dur durak bilmeden teskin ayinleri gerçekleştirdi. O kader anı geldi çattı."
languages.original_text: "I have a phylactery containing the mistress's blood. It needs to be taken to the laboratory, which is located behind one of the reliquary doors. The most ancient of sacred mechanisms will help to rebuild the rod — the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} ceaselessly performed the rites of appeasement so that the machine spirit would serve the House in its time of need. The fateful hour is now upon us."

traits.locale_text: "Hanımın kanını ihtiva eden filakteri bende. Bende ama laboratuvara götürülmesi gerek. Orası da kutsal emanet kapılarından birinin ardında. Kutlu mekanizmaların en kadimiyle inşa edeceğiz bu çubuğu. Makine ruhu Hane'mize dar zamanımızda el versin diye {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahipler{/g} dur durak bilmeden teskin ayinleri gerçekleştirdi. O kader anı geldi çattı."
